sentences.en: Best believe somebody's payin the pied piper.
sentences.cn: 最好相信有人会为你在身后默默注视着你.

sentences.en: I've Pied Piper since I don't buy kids following a flute player.

sentences.en: Of course, you won't take what I've said quite au pied de la letter.
sentences.cn: 当然, 你不会把我所说的话都当真.

sentences.en: On its way to the standing - galley Tilbury's notice got pied.

sentences.en: The Pied piper had all the children of Hamlin on his heels.
sentences.cn: 穿彩衣的吹笛人使得汉姆林镇所有的孩子都跟着他走.

sentences.en: The workers were - pied in building new houses.
sentences.cn: 工人们正在忙碌着盖新房子.

sentences.en: They own a cottage in Scotland and a house in London a pied - a - terre in Paris.
sentences.cn: 他们在苏格兰有一村舍,在伦敦有一所房子,在巴黎还有一套备用公寓.
哎呀, 多么小的一双脚!
